```{r}
library(simmer)
library(magrittr)
library("simmer.plot")
library(cli)
library(htmltools)

```



```{r}
set.seed(2121)


caminho <- trajectory("Paciente Fila de espera") %>% 
            select(c("mensagem","chamada"), policy = "shortest-queue") %>%
            seize_selected() %>%
            release_selected() %>%
            seize("atendente") %>%
            timeout(function() rnorm(1,4,1)) %>%
            release("atendente")
      

        


```

```{r}

h_t <- schedule(c(8,18), c(Inf,0), period = 18)

operaaa <- simmer("Problem3") %>% 
        add_resource("atendente",2 , capacity = h_t, ) %>%
        add_resource("mensagem") %>%
        add_resource("chamada") %>%
        add_generator("paciente",caminho, function() rexp(1,40)) %>%
        run(24)

```
